lessons.japanese: 目上の人のすることについて話す時、尊敬語を使います。
lessons.english: When speaking about your superiors' actions, you use respectful language.

lessons.japanese: 最近、目上の人に敬語を使わない若者が多い。
lessons.english: Recently there are a lot of young people who don't use respectful language to their superiors.

lessons.japanese: 日本語には敬語があります。
lessons.english: The Japanese language has honorific expressions.

lessons.japanese: 日本語には敬語があります。
lessons.english: The Japanese language has honorific expressions.

lessons.japanese: 最近、目上の人に敬語を使わない若者が多い。
lessons.english: Recently there are a lot of young people who don't use respectful language to their superiors.

lessons.japanese: 目上の人のすることについて話す時、尊敬語を使います。
lessons.english: When speaking about your superiors' actions, you use respectful language.

lessons.japanese: 敬語というのは日本語の一番難しいところだと思います。
lessons.english: I think honorific language is the hardest part of Japanese.

lessons.japanese: 敬語というのは日本語の一番難しいところだと思います。
lessons.english: I think honorific language is the hardest part of Japanese.
